description:
I think I'm going to use this to keep track of some bills - I really don't have too many, so I don't need all the bells and whistles that some of the other finance apps have. 

A couple suggestions here: definitely need the ability to edit the task/rename the task, color coding, drag drop 
Login with Google option so the entries will save 
(useful when you have to reinstall your OS)

I definitely love the simplicity and the multiple tabs at the top. 
I really would like to use this because I can't seem to find another app for this small task - but I have to be able to edit the list entries both completed and new.
This app wouldn't open for me. I tried to no avail. Granted, it could be in part due to the fact that I have a MacBook that is running Linux and this app doesn't like my hardware?
